Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

ContainerEngine.description: A container engine running in an operating system.
ContainerEngine.longDescription: This type shall contain a container engine running in an operating system.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ManagementURIs.description: The URIs to manage this container engine.
ManagementURIs.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of URIs to management interfaces for this container engine.  This is typically a web UI or API provided by the container engine.

SupportedImageTypes.description: The supported image types for this container engine.
SupportedImageTypes.longDescription: This property shall contain the supported image types for this container engine.

Type.longDescription: This property shall contain the type for this container engine.

Version.description: The version of this container engine.
Version.longDescription: This property shall contain the version of this container engine.

enumLongDescriptions.CRIO: This value shall indicate the container engine is CRI-O.
enumLongDescriptions.Docker: This value shall indicate the container engine is Docker.
enumLongDescriptions.containerd: This value shall indicate the container engine is containerd.

Kernel.description: The kernel information for an operating system.
Kernel.longDescription: This type shall contain the kernel information for an operating system.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Machine.description: The machine hardware name of the kernel.
Machine.longDescription: This property shall contain the machine hardware name of the kernel.  For strict POSIX operating systems, the value shall contain the output of `uname -m`.

Name.longDescription: This property shall contain the name of the kernel.  For strict POSIX operating systems, the value shall contain the output of `uname -s`.  For Microsoft Windows, the value shall contain the string name from the output of `ver`, from Command Prompt, prior to the first square brace (`[`), which is typically `Microsoft Windows`.

Release.longDescription: This property shall contain the release of the kernel.  For strict POSIX operating systems, the value shall contain the output of `uname -r`.  For Microsoft Windows, the value shall contain the decimal-delimited version from the output of `ver`, from Command Prompt, within the square braces (`[` and `]`), following the regular expression `^\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+$`.

Version.longDescription: This property shall contain the version of the kernel.  For strict POSIX operating systems, the value shall contain the output of `uname -v`.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

SoftwareImage.description: The link to the software image for this operating system.
SoftwareImage.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource of type SoftwareInventory that represents the software image from which this operating system runs.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

OperatingSystem.description: The OperatingSystem schema represents the operating system and software running on a computer system.
OperatingSystem.longDescription: This resource shall represent the operating system and software running on a computer system.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Applications.description: The link to the collection of applications running under this operating system.
Applications.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type ApplicationCollection that represent the applications running under this operating system.

ContainerEngines.description: The container engines running in this operating system.
ContainerEngines.longDescription: This property shall contain the container engines running in this operating system.

ContainerImages.description: The link to the collection of container images available to container engines on this operating system.
ContainerImages.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type ContainerImageCollection that represent the container images available to container engines on this operating system.

Containers.description: The link to the collection of containers running under this operating system.
Containers.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type ContainerCollection that represent the containers running under this operating system.

Kernel.description: The kernel information for this operating system.
Kernel.longDescription: This property shall contain the kernel information for this operating system.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This property shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

Type.longDescription: This property shall contain the type for this operating system.

UptimeSeconds.description: The wall-clock time this operating system has been running in seconds.
UptimeSeconds.longDescription: This property shall contain the wall-clock time this operating system has been running in seconds.

VirtualMachineEngines.description: The virtual machine engines running in this operating system.
VirtualMachineEngines.longDescription: This property shall contain the virtual machine engines running in this operating system.

VirtualMachineEngine.description: A virtual machine engine running in an operating system.
VirtualMachineEngine.longDescription: This type shall contain a virtual machine engine running in an operating system.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ManagementURIs.description: The URIs to manage this virtual machine engine.
ManagementURIs.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of URIs to management interfaces for this virtual machine engine.  This is typically a web UI or API provided by the virtual machine engine.

SupportedImageTypes.description: The supported image types for this container engine.
SupportedImageTypes.longDescription: This property shall contain the supported image types for this container engine.

Type.description: The type of virtual machine engine.
Type.longDescription: This property shall contain the type for this virtual machine engine.

Version.description: The version of this virtual machine engine.
Version.longDescription: This property shall contain the version of this virtual machine engine.

enumLongDescriptions.HyperV: This value shall indicate the virtual machine engine is Microsoft Hyper-V.
enumLongDescriptions.KVM: This value shall indicate the virtual machine engine is Linux KVM (Kernel-based Virtual Machine).
enumLongDescriptions.PowerVM: This value shall indicate the virtual machine engine is IBM PowerVM.
enumLongDescriptions.QEMU: This value shall indicate the virtual machine engine is QEMU (Quick Emulator).  If QEMU is acting as a frontend for another virtual machine engine, such as Xen or KVM, VirtualMachineEngines should contain additional entries to represent the backend virtual machine engines.
enumLongDescriptions.VMwareESX: This value shall indicate the virtual machine engine is VMware ESX or ESXi.
enumLongDescriptions.VirtualBox: This value shall indicate the virtual machine engine is Oracle VM VirtualBox.  If VirtualBox is acting as a frontend for another virtual machine engine, such as HyperV, VirtualMachineEngines should contain additional entries to represent the backend virtual machine engines.
enumLongDescriptions.Xen: This value shall indicate the virtual machine engine is Xen.

enumLongDescriptions.OVA: This value shall indicate a DSP0243-defined OVA (Open Virtual Appliance) image.
enumLongDescriptions.OVF: This value shall indicate a DSP0243-defined OVF (Open Virtualization Format) image.
enumLongDescriptions.QCOW: This value shall indicate a QEMU-defined QCOW (QEMU Copy-on-Write) image.
enumLongDescriptions.QCOW2: This value shall indicate a QEMU-defined QCOW2 (QEMU Copy-on-Write version 2) image.
enumLongDescriptions.Raw: This value shall indicate a raw disk image.
enumLongDescriptions.VDI: This value shall indicate an Oracle VM VirtualBox-defined VDI (Virtual Disk Image).
enumLongDescriptions.VHD: This value shall indicate a Microsoft Open Specification Promise-defined VHD (Virtual Hard Disk) image.
enumLongDescriptions.VMDK: This value shall indicate a VMware-defined VMDK (Virtual Machine Disk) image.

title: #OperatingSystem.v1_0_1.OperatingSystem
